title: listeria-hybrid-nf pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for validating the input samplesheet provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces. Use underscores or hyphens instead of spaces.

nanopore.errorMessage: Nanopore FastQ file path cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'. File must exist and be readable.
nanopore.description: Path to Nanopore long-read FastQ file (gzipped)

illumina_1.errorMessage: Illumina R1 FastQ file path cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'. File must exist and be readable.
illumina_1.description: Path to Illumina forward (R1) read FastQ file (gzipped)

illumina_2.errorMessage: Illumina R2 FastQ file path cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'. File must exist and be readable.
illumina_2.description: Path to Illumina reverse (R2) read FastQ file (gzipped)

errorMessage.required: All columns are required: sample, nanopore, illumina_1, illumina_2. This is a hybrid assembly pipeline and requires both Illumina and Nanopore data for all samples.

errorMessage.minItems: Samplesheet must contain at least one sample

errorMessage.uniqueItems: Sample names must be unique. Found duplicate sample identifier.
